pr_title: SE-9717: Added possibility to remove fields from ImportDictionary

timeline.message:
SE-9717: Added possibility to remove fields from ImportDictionary
Corresponding aliases will be deleted too

- Fixes: SE-9717

SE-9717: Rolled back changes in first commit and changed BaseImportHandler instead
getAutoImportMappings can now check if mapping should be considered when building list

- Fixes: SE-9717

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                 * Determines if mapping should be considered.
          
          
            
                 * Determines if an auto imported mapping should be put into the <tt>ImportDictionary</tt>.
timeline.author: andyHa

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                 * This method returns true by default and is intended to be overwritten
          
          
            
                 * This method can be overwritten to suppress properties which wear an <tt>AutoImport</tt> annotation
          
          
            
                 * from being put into the import dictionary.
timeline.author: andyHa
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -324,9 +324,23 @@ public ImportDictionary getImportDictionary() { .orElse(false)) .map(Property::getName) .map(Mapping::named) + .filter(this::isAutoImportMappingAccepted) .collect(Collectors.toList()); } + /** + * Determines if mapping should be considered. + *

+ * This method returns true by default and is intended to be overwritten

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                 * @return true by default
          
          
            
                 * @return <tt>true</tt> to accept the mapping, <tt>false</tt> otherwise
timeline.author: andyHa
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -324,9 +324,23 @@ public ImportDictionary getImportDictionary() { .orElse(false)) .map(Property::getName) .map(Mapping::named) + .filter(this::isAutoImportMappingAccepted) .collect(Collectors.toList()); } + /** + * Determines if mapping should be considered. + *

+ * This method returns true by default and is intended to be overwritten + * by sub classes if specific mappings should be ignored. + * + * @param mapping the mapping to evaluate + * @return true by default

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                 * by sub classes if specific mappings should be ignored.
          
          
            
                 * By default, this will constantly return <tt>true</tt>.
timeline.author: andyHa
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -324,9 +324,23 @@ public ImportDictionary getImportDictionary() { .orElse(false)) .map(Property::getName) .map(Mapping::named) + .filter(this::isAutoImportMappingAccepted) .collect(Collectors.toList()); } + /** + * Determines if mapping should be considered. + *

+ * This method returns true by default and is intended to be overwritten + * by sub classes if specific mappings should be ignored.

timeline.message:
SE-9717: Added requested changes to JavaDoc of isAutoImportMappingAccepted

- Fixes: SE-9717
